mapper.sql: TM_PROJECT_NUMBER, PROJECT_NAME, BID_OPENING_TIME, BID_OPENING_LOCATION, ATTRIBUTION_DEPARTMENT, PROJECT_LOCATION, PRINCIPAL, DISTRICT_OWNERSHIP, SERVICE_FEE_CATEGORY, PROJECT_SERVICE_TYPES, TENDER_TYPE, COOPERATION_UNIT, INCOME_DISTRIBUTION, COMMENT, IS_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, ARCHIVING_TIME, RECORD_REMINDER_TIME, IS_RECORD_STATUS, IS_EXTRACT_EXPERT, TMPROJECTMANAGE_ID
mapper.insert:
insert into
( TMPROJECTMANAGE_ID, PROJECT_NAME, BID_OPENING_TIME, BID_OPENING_LOCATION, ATTRIBUTION_DEPARTMENT, PROJECT_LOCATION, DISTRICT_OWNERSHIP, SERVICE_FEE_CATEGORY, PROJECT_SERVICE_TYPES, TENDER_TYPE, COOPERATION_UNIT, INCOME_DISTRIBUTION, COMMENT, PRINCIPAL, CREATE_TIME, IS_EXTRACT_EXPERT, IS_STATUS, IS_RECORD_STATUS ) values ( #{TMPROJECTMANAGE_ID}, #{PROJECT_NAME}, #{BID_OPENING_TIME}, #{BID_OPENING_LOCATION}, #{ATTRIBUTION_DEPARTMENT}, #{PROJECT_LOCATION}, #{DISTRICT_OWNERSHIP}, #{SERVICE_FEE_CATEGORY}, #{PROJECT_SERVICE_TYPES}, #{TENDER_TYPE}, #{COOPERATION_UNIT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{INCOME_DISTRIBUTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{COMMENT}, #{PRINCIPAL}, #{CREATE_TIME}, #{IS_EXTRACT_EXPERT}, #{IS_STATUS}, #{IS_RECORD_STATUS} )
mapper.update:
update
set PROJECT_NAME = #{PROJECT_NAME}, BID_OPENING_TIME = #{BID_OPENING_TIME}, BID_OPENING_LOCATION = #{BID_OPENING_LOCATION}, ATTRIBUTION_DEPARTMENT = #{ATTRIBUTION_DEPARTMENT}, PROJECT_LOCATION = #{PROJECT_LOCATION}, DISTRICT_OWNERSHIP = #{DISTRICT_OWNERSHIP}, SERVICE_FEE_CATEGORY = #{SERVICE_FEE_CATEGORY}, PROJECT_SERVICE_TYPES = #{PROJECT_SERVICE_TYPES}, TENDER_TYPE = #{TENDER_TYPE}, COOPERATION_UNIT = #{COOPERATION_UNIT,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INCOME_DISTRIBUTION = #{INCOME_DISTRIBUTION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMMENT = #{COMMENT} where TMPROJECTMANAGE_ID = #{TMPROJECTMANAGE_ID}
mapper.select:
select tpj.TMPROJECTMANAGE_ID, tpj.PROJECT_NAME, tpj.BID_OPENING_TIME, tpj.BID_OPENING_LOCATION,
d.DEPARTMENT_ID, d.NAME AS departmentName,
tpl.TMPROJECTLOCATION_ID, tpl.PROJECT_LOCATION_NAME,
tdo.TMDISTRICTOWNERSHIP_ID, tdo.TMDISTRICTOWNERSHIPNAME,
tpj.SERVICE_FEE_CATEGORY, tpj.PROJECT_SERVICE_TYPES,
ttt.TMTENDERTYPE_ID, ttt.TENDER_TYPE_NAME,
tcu.TMCOOPERATIONUNIT_ID, tcu.COOPERATION_UNIT_NAME,
tpj.INCOME_DISTRIBUTION, tpj.COMMENT,
os.STAFF_ID, os.NAME AS staffName,
tpj.CREATE_TIME, tpj.IS_EXTRACT_EXPERT, tpj.IS_STATUS, tpj.IS_RECORD_STATUS from tendermanagement.TM_TMPROJECTMANAGE tpj LEFT JOIN tendermanagement.oa_department d on tpj.ATTRIBUTION_DEPARTMENT = d.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT JOIN tendermanagement.tm_tmprojectlocation tpl on tpj.PROJECT_LOCATION = tpl.TMPROJECTLOCATION_ID LEFT JOIN tendermanagement.tm_tmdistrictownership tdo on tpj.DISTRICT_OWNERSHIP = tdo.TMDISTRICTOWNERSHIP_ID LEFT JOIN tendermanagement.tm_tmtendertype ttt on tpj.TENDER_TYPE = ttt.TMTENDERTYPE_ID LEFT JOIN tendermanagement.tm_tmcooperationunit tcu on tpj.COOPERATION_UNIT = tcu.TMCOOPERATIONUNIT_ID LEFT JOIN tendermanagement.oa_staff os on tpj.PRINCIPAL = os.STAFF_ID where 1=1
and (
)
